price: Lalle ne Allah Yanã* da mulkin sammai da ƙasa, Yanã rãyarwa kuma Yanã matarwa. Kuma bã ku da wani masõyi, kuma bã ku da mataimaki, baicin Allah.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۚ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ
footnotes: * Wannan ãyã tanã nũna cewa taklĩfin da Allah Yake azã wa bãyinSa na yãƙi da waninSa, bã dõmin ya wahalar da su ba ne. Yanã yi ne dõmin alheri a gare su, Shĩ Allah Mawãdaci ne, Yanã da ƙasa da sammai, kuma shĩ ne Mai yin halittar kõme.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yuḥ'yī wayumītu wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
